I messaged Itou-sensei weeks ago, asked him if theres a chance for a sequel and he said theres a possibility for that but the whole thing is not in his decision. Overall this series is fantastic. It was cliche ntr ending but it was executed creatively. Hell, Emi is actually in love with Sensei you dont usually see the woman in love with the ntr dude in NTR mangas. Usually its blackmails and rape. This one is really different. You know, in NTR mangas youre suppose to self insert to the ntr dude not the cuck. Thats what these 12 year old virgins aka vanilla fags dont understand. And hello? Cheating is a standard porno genre globally. And in porn you tone down morals. As long as it doesnt involve children, animals and all that extremely weird shit every fetishes are ok to me. Anyways, I would recommend this manga to those who just started reading ntr. 9/10.
